articles.title: Fed's Bostic says there's no reason to change policy despite inflation fears - CNBC
articles.description: Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said he's comfortable with ultra-loose policy even as inflation gains steam.
articles.content:
Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic told CNBC on Monday he's comfortable with the central bank's ultra-loose policy even as inflation gains steam in the economy.
